articles.author: Rory O’Neill
articles.title: Lethal heat is Europe’s new climate reality - politico.eu
articles.description: Some 4,500 people could die in the next three days due to soaring temperatures, an expert said.
articles.content: Its no longer a question of if we will have a heatwave, but how many are we going to experience this year and how long will they last, said Marisol Yglesias Gonzalez, technical officer for climate ch… [+1704 chars]
